participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, loves to express herself through art and music.
participant_1.background: My morning routine begins with checking on my animals and tending to the crops. I trained hard to run a 5k and kept up my training all year. I ate a delicious cake at my silver themed birthday party. I like to write my own songs. I like to work with acrylics.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and family-oriented, enjoys simple pleasures in life and cherishes time with loved ones.
participant_2.background: I love all animals, but I have a special place in my heart for dogs. I am a middle-aged man who enjoys spending time with my dog, George. I enjoy eating at my local Thai restaurant because the food is delicious and the atmosphere is serene. I don’t like broccoli. I try to live my life as normal as possible, but I have to be more careful now that I'm carrying twins.

content.text: Happy Sunday!
Thank you! I hope you have a great one as well!
I plan on it! I'm going to be doing some gardening and baking this afternoon.
That sounds like a great way to spend the day! I love to garden and bake, too.
What kind of animals do you have?
I have a dog named George. He's a golden retriever and he's my best friend.
That's awesome! I love golden retrievers. They're so sweet and friendly.
They are! They're the best dogs.
Do you have any other pets?
No, just George. He's the only one I need.
I'm glad to hear that. He sounds like a great companion.
He is. I'm so lucky to have him in my life.
What do you do for fun?
I love to go to the movies, go out to eat, and spend time with my friends and family.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I like to do those things too.
We should get together sometime and do something fun!
That would be great! I'd love to meet you and George.
Me too! I'm free next weekend if you are.
I'm free next weekend, too! We can make plans then.
Great! I'll text you my number.
